name: Toil and Puzzles
description:
“Eye of newt, and toe of frog,

Wool of bat, and tongue of dog,

Adder's fork, and blind-worm's sting,

Lizard's leg, and owlet's wing,—

For a charm of powerful trouble,

Like a hell-broth boil and bubble.

Double, double toil and trouble;

Fire burn, and caldron bubble.”

Toil and Puzzles is a demo of a click-and-drag puzzle game about a lonely journey where a witch's child goes on adventures to gather the magical items so they can rescue their mom. Although currently incomplete, we plan to keep building the game, which is expected to have 5 levels in total.
